item.title: Bellman-Ford
item.description: This is the first post of a new series called Algorithms. The idea behind it is explaining algorithms that I have previously worked with or new ones I have found interesting ðŸ˜„. Each post of this series will have the following structure: - Introduction - Idea or concept - Pseudo-code - Implementation in real code Source: techiedelight.com Introduction In this post I’m going to explain the Bellman-Ford algorithm.
